QuestData.Title: I Bring Us Great Shame
QuestData.Description: I have failed my fellow brewers.$b$bI took some supplies out to the clearing, east of our tree... and I left them there. Now, with the sha corrupting the land, and the mantid on the prowl, it is too dangerous for me to bring them back.$b$bIf you would help me look for them, perhaps I could regain some of my lost honor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Lost Keg, the Lost Mugs, and the Lost Picnic Supplies.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find them? Can it be?
QuestData.RewardText: You have brought me joy, traveler.
